content: व्यंजक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (जिका|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Making clear, indicating, showing, manifesting. {@--2@} Suggesting or insinuating a meaning (as a word, <ab>opp.</ab> वाचक and लाक्षणिक q. <ab>q. v.</ab> v.). --कः {@--1@} Dramatic action or gesture, external indication of an internal feeling by suitable gesticulation. {@--2@} A sign, symbol. {@--3@} Figurative expression or insinuation.
